item.description:
Update: "Free Wine Tasting, with Winemakers at "The Wine Bottega" 5:00 - 8:00PM hosted by Kirk. Look for Kirk holding the "Meetup" sign outside about 4:30pm
This event is first come, first serve. Find Kirk waiting in line at 4:30pm. This event starts at 5PM so please plan on getting there at least 30 min. ahead. Late comers will be turned away once they have already reached capacity or when they run out of wine (regardless if you have signed up with this group!).

An Impromptu Abbondanza featuring Seven Italian Winemakers! This will be an amazing upstairs & downstairs extravaganza with the winemakers from: Villa di Corlo in Emilia RomagnaPoggio Amorelli in TuscanyMate in TuscanyAzienda Tola in SicilyCantarutti in FriuliScagliola in the PiedmontNicolis in the Veneto

Closest T stop is "North Station" on the Orange and Green Lines

Caio!

For details: http://thewinebottega...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Kirk. He will be hosting this event.
item.name: The Wine Bottega: Free Tasting
